message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CL 

This paper deals with deep learning applications for scene geometry and semantics, specifically for per-pixel depth regression, semantic and instance segmentation. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a principled approach to multi-task deep learning, which involves weighing multiple loss functions based on the homoscedastic uncertainty of each task. This suggests that the paper could also fit into the categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper deals with natural language processing tasks such as semantic segmentation, which could place it in the category of cs.CL (Computation and Language).
